text: Sipas ʙa'di haloki ummatho kitoʙi Qur'onro ʙa kasone az ʙandagonamon, ki ʙarguzida ʙudem (ja'ne, ummati Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam), ʙa meros dodem. Ba'ze ʙar xud sitam kardand va ʙa'ze rohi mijonaro ʙarguzidand va ʙa'ze ʙo farmoni Alloh dar korhoi nek pesvo hastand. Va in ast ʙaxsoise ʙuzurg
